mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_dict (DICTCODE, DICTCHNAME, STDCODE, DICTDECIPT, PID, ORDERCODE, REMARKS, `STATUS`, NATURE_MARK, ENABLEMARK) values (#{dictcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictchname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictdecipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordercode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{natureMark,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{enablemark,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update t_dict set DICTCODE = #{dictcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICTCHNAME = #{dictchname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STDCODE = #{stdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICTDECIPT = #{dictdecipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDERCODE = #{ordercode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, NATURE_MARK = #{natureMark,jdbcType=CHAR}, ENABLEMARK = #{enablemark,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, DICTCODE, DICTCHNAME, STDCODE, DICTDECIPT, PID, ORDERCODE, REMARKS, `STATUS`, NATURE_MARK, ENABLEMARK from t_dict where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, DICTCODE, DICTCHNAME, STDCODE, DICTDECIPT, PID, ORDERCODE, REMARKS, `STATUS`, NATURE_MARK, ENABLEMARK from t_dict
select ID, DICTCODE, DICTCHNAME, STDCODE, DICTDECIPT, PID, ORDERCODE, REMARKS, `STATUS`, NATURE_MARK, ENABLEMARK from t_dict where PID = 3
